definition: to live in peace and work happily (idiom)
content/calm/still/quiet/safe/secure/in good health/to find a place for/to install/to fix/to fit/to bring (a charge against sb)/to pacify/to harbor (good intentions)/security/safety/peace/ampere
to reside/to be (in a certain position)/to store up/to be at a standstill/residence/house/restaurant/classifier for bedrooms
(archaic) sentence-final particle expressing a doubting attitude
line of business/industry/occupation/job/employment/school studies/enterprise/property/(Buddhism) karma/deed/to engage in/already

sentences.english: Social management improved step by step. Social stability was ensured and the.people lived and worked in peace and contentment.
sentences.chinese: 社会管理逐步完善，社会大局稳定，人民安居乐业。

sentences.english: The ideal life for Chinese is to live and work in peace and contentment.
sentences.chinese: 中国人的理想生活方式就是安居乐业。

sentences.english: I hope that the country prospers and the people are at peace.
sentences.chinese: 我希望国家繁荣昌盛，人民安居乐业。

sentences.english: In time of peace, people can live and work in peace and contentment.
sentences.chinese: 身处太平之世，人民方能安居乐业。

sentences.english: Democracy at the grassroots level will be better practiced. People will enjoy a sound public order and live and work in peace and contentment.
sentences.chinese: 基层民主更加健全，社会秩序良好，人民安居乐业。

definition: Anju district of Suining city 遂寧市|遂宁市[Sui4 ning2 shi4], Sichuan
the country prospers, the people at peace (idiom); peace and prosperity
efficient government, people at peace (idiom); all is well with the state and the people
having ample food and clothing (idiom); well fed and clothed
Leye county in Baise 百色[Bai3 se4], Guangxi
stable household, established profession (idiom); settled and comfortably off
Anting township in Tainan county 台南縣|台南县[Tai2 nan2 xian4], Taiwan
favorable weather (idiom); good weather for crops
the whole world at peace (idiom); peace and prosperity
Anning District of Lanzhou City 蘭州市|兰州市[Lan2 zhou1 Shi4], Gansu/Anning City, to the west of Kunming 昆明[Kun1 ming2], Yunnan
